thread.title: Talk Talk says cyberattack data theft not as bad as feared
thread.title_full: Talk Talk says cyberattack data theft not as bad as feared - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Talk Talk says cyberattack data theft not as bad as feared
text: LONDON (AP) — British telecoms company Talk Talk says a cyberattack feared to have put 4 million customers' details at risk is not as bad as initially thought. Chief executive Dido Harding said Saturday that attackers hacked the company's website but not its core systems, and "none of our customers' credit card information has been exposed." »
